alert.note: Alert for Southeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 5:40PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM AKST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...East winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM AKST Sunday.. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILSâ€¦East winds will continue to strengthen today with the strongest winds expected between 9 PM AKST Saturday to 3 AM Sunday morning.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of Widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
